acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items were given to the University of Virginia Library on January 15, 1996, by Mrs. Lois D. Elliot, Charlottesville, Virginia.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ca. sixty items, ca. 1890-1940, including six University of Virginiadiplomas & certificates, 1898-1900 (transferred to the UVA Diploma files), and eight medical & military certificates, 1900-1937, of Dr. Norborne Page Cocke, and miscellaneous photographs of the Cocke family, students and groups at the University of Virginia.
Identified photographs include the following persons:

list.item: Jack Bowey, Jack Page, "Landow" Moore, & E. Bradford Burwell
Rockwell S. Brank, Jonathan Bryan, [George ?] Griffith, Buck Jackson, Paul Lee Cocke, 1895-1896 (2 copies)
Jack Page, Landow Moore, & Brad Burwell
Gordon Wilson, John Hill Tucker, Manuel Marxuach& Henry Dawson Furniss
Nick Worthington, R.D. Ballantine, & Markham Marshall
